sentence: What did the hamburger name his daughter? patty.
explanation: A patty is a flat, round piece of ground meat. A patty can also refer to a type of lightweight, fluffy design, typically used in the context of a garment or accessory.
first_new_sentence: The chef grilled a beef patty for the hamburger.
second_new_sentence: The fashion designer included a lace patty in her new collection.
